result.arabic_text: وَذَٰلِكُمۡ ظَنُّكُمُ ٱلَّذِي ظَنَنتُم بِرَبِّكُمۡ أَرۡدَىٰكُمۡ فَأَصۡبَحۡتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ
result.translation: Ukwo kwiyumvira nabi rero Imana yanyu Rurema Allah, ni kwo kwabataye mu muriro, muca muba mu bahomvye ubuzima bwabo n’ivyabo kw’isi no mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa”.
